entries.definition: to gain or obtain something, especially knowledge or skills
examples: She acquired fluency in three languages.
The company acquired several smaller businesses last year.

entries.definition: to put a plan or system into effect
examples: We need to implement the new strategy immediately.
The software will be implemented next month.

entries.definition: a plan of action designed to achieve a long-term or overall aim
examples: Our marketing strategy focuses on digital channels.
What's your strategy for the meeting?
